incoming.value:
default:
  image: alpine:3.15

  before_script:
    - apk add --no-cache git
    - apk add bash
    - apk update && apk add --no-cache nodejs~=16 npm
    - apk add --no-cache python3 py3-pip
    - apk add --update --no-cache openssh

  after_script:
    - rm -rf ~/.ssh

stages:
  # Lint code, test code quality, and ensure there are no insecure dependencies
  - quality
  # Run unit and integration test suites
  - test
  # version bump
  - bump
  # Generate artifact.json file (needed for admin-essentials starting IAP 2020.1)
  - generate
  # Promote artifact.json to IAP
  - promote

security:
  allow_failure: true
  stage: quality
  script:
    - npm i
    # check node version:
    - 'echo "node version: $(node --version)"'
    # check npm version
    - 'echo "npm version: $(npm --version)"'
    - npm audit --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org

schema_validation:
  allow_failure: false
  stage: test
  script:
    - npm i
    # check node version:
    - 'echo "node version: $(node --version)"'
    # check npm version
    - 'echo "npm version: $(npm --version)"'
    - npm run validateSchema

schemaLinks_validation:
  allow_failure: false
  stage: test
  script:
    - npm i
    # check node version:
    - 'echo "node version: $(node --version)"'
    # check npm version
    - 'echo "npm version: $(npm --version)"'
    - npm run validateSchemaLinks

version_bump:
  stage: bump
  only:
    - master
  script:
    - sh ./scripts/git_setup.sh
    - sh ./scripts/node_setup.sh
    - sh ./scripts/ver_bump.sh

generate_artifact_json:
  allow_failure: false
  stage: generate
  artifacts:
    paths:
    - artifact.json
    expire_in: 5 mins 
  script:
    - sh ./scripts/commit.sh

promote_to_iap:
  allow_failure: false
  only:
    - master
  except:
    variables: 
      - $PROMOTE == "False"
  dependencies: 
    - generate_artifact_json
  stage: promote
  script:
    - |
      pip3 install requests
      if ! python3 ./scripts/promote.py ./artifact.json; then
        echo -e "\033[0;31mERROR: ***********************************************************************************"
        echo "ERROR: There was an issue promoting artifact.json to IAP."
        echo -e "ERROR: ***********************************************************************************\033[0m"
        exit 1
      fi 
      
# Only use spaces to indent your .yml configuration.
# -----
